oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Vaquero Aso, Luna
Piper, Emil
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Delphinus : development of a digital communication device for diving
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: diving
divers
communication
wireless
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The project started when the diving club Seahorse came up with the idea to develop a new wireless digital communication device for divers. In comparison to other devices that exist, it had to be smarter, more user friendly and cheaper.
